4. SSHFS (sshfs - filesystem client based on SSH File Transfer Protocol)

4. SSHFS (sshfs - filesystem client based on SSH File Transfer Protocol)

$ sudo apt-get install sshfs
$ sudo sshfs root@172.16.0.5:/home/neo /mnt
$ sudo fusermount -u /mnt
